title: Not responding, 0% loading & the reconnect button does not show sometimes
body: Every time I try to play a game either the loading page with the heroes does not load staying 0% and it keeps "not responding" and when I try to reconnect it does the same thing and I am never able to access the game. Sometimes when I close and reopen the client the reconnect button does not appear and it keeps saying "Game is still in progress". I want help please.

replies.body: While you're on that loading screen, your client is trying to make a new connection which can often times get blocked by firewalls or antivirus. Do me a favor and try disabling those really quick and test it in a custom game to see if that lets you in.
